message: Let's split it 50/50, no need for further negotiations!

Bob, I'm not going to accept an offer that gives me less than 2% of the original $100. I'm starting to think we'll both end up with nothing if we don't come to a reasonable agreement soon.
I'm willing to give you a larger share, but I need to get something out of this. I'll take 20% of the original $100, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.

Bob, I'm not going to accept an offer that gives me less than 1% of the original $100. I'm out of options, but I'm not going to give up without a fight. I'd rather walk away with nothing than accept this offer.
